questionTitle: I couldn't do question 6, so I ________ it out.
I don't want to wait until tomorrow; I ________ go at once.
The old man was very fond ________ telling stories.
I am tired ________ grammar exercises.
I am ________ this essay right now.
Don't let him ________ it.
How long ________ French?
Al's doctor insists ________ for a few days.
You ________ your seats today if you want to go to the game.
After he had researched and ________ his paper, he found some additional material that he should have included .
The new champion, ________, took over the dining room.
The three friends all ________ for the same job .
I knew him ________ I was child .
The sergeant's orders were perfectly ________.
The Director has just gone on his ________ leave. He gets four weeks' holiday a year and he is taking it all at the same time. So if you wish to see him, come back in a month's time.
Before the invention of refrigeration, the ________ of fish and meat was a problem.
My brother did not go to school yesterday. Neither ________.
He ________ for a job for some weeks but he has not found one.
The firm went bankrupt and their shares became ________.
The ascent of the mountain is ________, but anyone who makes it to the top is rewarded by a spectacular view.
